timeline.message: check for null target inside the deploy command, could happen with internal apps, such as wstx-services or admin console

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't target == null be checked within getDeploymentGroupNamed
timeline.author: svendiedrichsen

replies.bodyText: that was about 50/50 decision on my part, so this way "won out" by a hair
replies.author: lprimak
